item.title: github: Upcoming changes to GitHub Dependabot pull request comment commands
item.description:
On November 11, 2025, GitHub will deprecate several Dependabot-specific pull request comment commands and rely on GitHubâ€™s native pull request features instead; users should update any workflows or automations that depend on those comment commands.

  • Source: GitHub
